oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sword and scabbard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sword and scabbard, three branch brass guard with floral decorations at terminals; floral escatcheon on guillion; wood grip with twisted wire wrapping. The blade is plain with acid etched cartouche reading, "Manufacture//d'Equipements Militaires//Auguste Fonson 49 Raedes//Fabiqes Bruselles [?]."
